title: 820-01700-A dead after Waterdamage
message:
Hey i have a Macbook Mainboard here 820-01700-A.

It was a waterdamage. i clean all and all looks ok now.
I have dfu i tried dfu revive. but failed with (AMRestoreErrorDomain error -1)

did you know what i am missing?

Any chance for data? can i swap t2 and nand to new mainboard?

title: 820-01700-A dead after Waterdamage
message:
Something more affected by corrosion for sure.
Possibly corroded traces, or passive components (resistors, capacitors).
May also have accumulated crap underneath some BGA chips.

title: 820-01700-A dead after Waterdamage
message:
okee is it possible to swap boards? 
what do i need ?

T2 chip? nands?

title: 820-01700-A dead after Waterdamage
message:
Data is encrypted and the key is stored into T2.
You can try swaping both T2 and NAND at same time, but not sure if helps.
T2 will detect all the changes in the peripherals and may enter into recovery.
